TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ItemEvents_10_BeforeAttachmentWriteToTempFileEventHandler(Attachment Attachment, out bool Cancel);
.class public auto ansi sealed ItemEvents_10_BeforeAttachmentWriteToTempFileEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ItemEvents_10_BeforeAttachmentWriteToTempFileEventHandler(Attachment As Attachment, ByRef Cancel As Boolean)
public delegate void ItemEvents_10_BeforeAttachmentWriteToTempFileEventHandler(Attachment ^ Attachment, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] bool % Cancel);

Docs.param: Defina como True para cancelar a operação; Caso contrário, defina como False para permitir que o anexo a ser gravado.
Docs.summary: This is a delegate for an event in the corresponding object. After implementing a callback method for the event, use this delegate to connect the callback method to the event. If there are multiple versions of the event interface, this delegate connects the callback method for the event in the specified version of Outlook.
